name: Bouncin
description:
This was made for the Score Space 21 Game Jam. 

Controls:

Arrow keys to Move

Space to Jump

Tips: 

Avoid getting hit by Red Saw

I hope you enjoy and thanks for playing!

For the Best Experiences, Download the game.

WebGL update 1.1

- Added Pause Button

- Add Telegraph for enemy spawning

Currently working on more updates for adding to quality of game.

 If you have any suggestions, feel free to post them
